text: Hello Ophir, if you subscribe to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog|HubSpot's Developer Changelog> you will get notified about any platform changes like the Marketing Events API moving into general availability :slightly_smiling_face:

"The scope needed for this API call isn't available for public use. If you have questions, contact support or post in our developer forum."

what does this error mean?
This means you cannot use it with client-side Javascript (from the browser, unauthenticated)
It can only be used server-side with either a hapikey (or the recommended way: with an access token)
Why am I getting cors error while trying to create a deal via v3 api in vue

Hey everyone - what’s the recommended way of checking if my app is still connected via OAuth? I’ve tried `/oauth/v1/access-tokens/{accessToken}` to get meta but it appears to return hub_domain even after disconnected
I mean obviously I could just try out an API call but that feels like it’s not the proper way to do it.
You can’t use those APIs via the client side
They must be invoked server side with the correct authentication
Are you using it for offline access?
If so you will want to store the refresh token
I would just handle exchanging for an access token in your middleware
Ah that’s a good shout - yes I am using it for offline access - I realised the access token was actually still valid after the user deletes the app
But refreshing the token won’t work in that scenario so I can use that as the test - thanks!
following
Hi, Has anyone tried before how to upload attachment to a deal using API? Thanks!
this JSON does not look quite right to me
it looks like a hunk of code from a postman REST API collection JSON file, and not the actual data on what to send to what endpoint using JS / AJAX code or server code, etc
not really API question, and expected behavior of feature, AFAIK
Dennis from HS got to this one
other thing I was going to suggest is, GET params are a multimap, so try >1 `topic_id` entry and see if ti works

I am using the saleforce connector for HubSpot and currently I am getting this error : Sync status:Not syncing
Deal not in Salesforce pipeline.
 I have no gotten this same error when syncing SF & HubSpot in the past. Does anyone know how to resolve. The Contacts and Accounts associated with the deal are in SF and are syncing fine.

Hello all,

I created 3 custom objects successfully, and when I try to create a 4th custom object I got this error: `The scope needed for this API call isn\'t available for public use. If you have questions, contact support or post in our developer forum.` ... I don't get it... I basically used the same code for all 4 objects... only the properties are changing... Any thoughts?
What are the valid associationTypes when creating an association between contact and company??
getting the error `contact_to_company is not a valid association type between companies and contacts`

hum… apparently the “new” API doesn’t support these associations. Hopefully this is under development. It makes no sense to not implement it in the new API.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/associations>
Question - The new deals API method `Read a batch of deals by internal ID, or unique property values`, can I use it instead of search API to search for deals in a specific pipeline?
I had the same error today but it has nothing to do with calling from the cllient-side: <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1620158260440300>
This message was deleted.

follow this documentation to create custom object schema and then you can use `*/crm/v3/objects/{objectType}*` to create custom objects ( instead of pull from another application, you have to push data to CRM )
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/crm-custom-objects>
you have to send a post api to `*/crm/v3/objects/{objectType}*` to create crm object from your application
